generatedTitle: Leading Tire Manufacturers: Bridgestone, LEGO Group, and Michelin

extractFactDictList.question: Who is the largest tire manufacturer in the world based on tire-related revenue?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The largest tire manufacturer in the world, based on tire-related revenue, is Bridgestone.

extractFactDictList.question: Where is Bridgestone headquartered?
extractFactDictList.sentence: Headquartered in Tokyo, Bridgestone has 139 production facilities in 24 countries and made $29 billion in revenue.

extractFactDictList.question: How many production facilities does Bridgestone have and in how many countries?
extractFactDictList.sentence: Headquartered in Tokyo, Bridgestone has 139 production facilities in 24 countries and made $29 billion in revenue.

extractFactDictList.question: Who holds the Guinness World Record for largest tire manufacturer per year?
extractFactDictList.sentence: However, if we consider the number of tires produced, the title goes to LEGO Group.

extractFactDictList.question: Why does LEGO Group hold the title of largest tire manufacturer per year?
extractFactDictList.sentence: This is because nearly half of all LEGO sets include wheels of some sort.
extractFactDictList.phrase: Nearly half of all LEGO sets include wheels of some sort

extractFactDictList.question: Which company is the largest tire brand in Europe?
extractFactDictList.sentence: In terms of real-life tires, Michelin is also a major player.

extractFactDictList.question: Where is Michelin based?
extractFactDictList.sentence: Based in France, the company has 51 manufacturing plants in 18 countries and over 125,000 employees.

extractFactDictList.question: How much revenue did Michelin make in 2021?
extractFactDictList.sentence: In 2021, Michelin made $27 billion in revenue.
